description.value:
You briefly transform your features into the horrific visage of a hag, striking fear into your enemies. Foes in the area must attempt a Will save.

Success The foe is unaffected.

Failure The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.

Heightened (5th) Foes in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} on a success, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a failure, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] for 1 round on a critical failure. They are still unaffected on a critical success.
